title: Help with changing email
body: I have been trying to change my password. But it shows under my email a bunch of numbers. This is not the email i signed up with. Also i keep getting an error message that an unauthorized login was attempted on another device then my client exits. I need to change my password so I can fix this. Please help.

replies.body: Due to you not recognizing that email and getting the unauthorized login attempts over and over, I think it's pretty safe to assume your account has been compromised. Reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) asap to make sure your account gets resecured, and they'll be able to reverse any damage that was done in the process.
